summary: A mysterious man arrives in a small American town seeking his wife, though his presence plunges the community into a bloodbath.
cast: Cristobal Tapia Montt|Lorenza Izzo|Luis Gnecco|Ariel Levy|Nicolás Durán|Alessandra Guerzoni|Aaron Burns|Pablo Vila|Sally Rose|John Allan|Eric Kleinsteuber|Nicolás Platovsky|Tessie Spoljaric-Woodgate|Constanza Contreras|Elvis Gonzalez|Roderick Teerink
title: The Stranger
